sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.user_cd ,main.user_name ,main.sex_cd ,main.birthday ,main.id_card_no ,main.ancestral_native_place ,main.ethnicity_cd ,main.user_number ,main.registered_residence ,main.policy_cd ,main.education_cd ,main.educational_degree_cd ,main.stature ,main.weight ,main.blood_type_cd ,main.marital_status_cd ,main.nationality ,main.email ,main.telephone ,main.mobile ,main.fax ,main.home_address ,main.graduate_institutions ,main.major ,main.residence_type ,main.birth_place ,main.contact_province_uid ,province.region_name contact_province_name ,main.contact_city_uid ,city.region_name contact_city_name ,main.contact_county_uid ,county.region_name contact_county_name ,main.contact_address ,main.health_info ,main.base_uid ,main.dept_uid ,main.position_uid ,main.positions_grade ,main.first_job_date ,main.entry_date ,main.probation_end_date ,main.positive_date ,main.retire_date ,main.employment_type ,main.contract_start_date ,main.contract_end_date ,main.accumulation_fund_account ,main.bank_name ,main.bank_account_number ,main.location_uid ,main.status_cd ,main.constellation ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,SYS004.sub_name sex_name ,DEMO_028.sub_name ethnicity_name ,DEMO_029.sub_name policy_name ,DEMO_030.sub_name education_name ,DEMO_031.sub_name educational_degree_name ,DEMO_032.sub_name blood_type_name ,DEMO_033.sub_name marital_status_name ,DEMO_034.sub_name status_name ,dept.dept_name dept_name ,dept.dept_full_name ,post.position_name ,location.dept_name location_name ,location.dept_full_name location_full_name ,temp_dept.company_uid ,temp_dept.company_name ,temp_dept.area_uid ,temp_dept.area_name ,base.base_name ,YEAR(GETDATE()) - YEAR(main.birthday) age ,YEAR(GETDATE()) - YEAR(main.entry_date) seniority ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM demo_employee main LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary SYS004 ON SYS004.record_status = 1 AND SYS004.main_cd = 'SYS004' AND SYS004.sub_cd = main.sex_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_028 ON DEMO_028.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_028.main_cd = 'DEMO_028' AND DEMO_028.sub_cd = main.ethnicity_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_029 ON DEMO_029.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_029.main_cd = 'DEMO_029' AND DEMO_029.sub_cd = main.policy_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_030 ON DEMO_030.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_030.main_cd = 'DEMO_030' AND DEMO_030.sub_cd = main.education_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_031 ON DEMO_031.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_031.main_cd = 'DEMO_031' AND DEMO_031.sub_cd = main.educational_degree_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_032 ON DEMO_032.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_032.main_cd = 'DEMO_032' AND DEMO_032.sub_cd = main.blood_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_033 ON DEMO_033.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_033.main_cd = 'DEMO_033' AND DEMO_033.sub_cd = main.marital_status_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary DEMO_034 ON DEMO_034.record_status = 1 AND DEMO_034.main_cd = 'DEMO_034' AND DEMO_034.sub_cd = main.status_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON dept.uid = main.dept_uid AND dept.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_dept location ON location.uid = main.location_uid AND location.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_position post ON post.uid = main.position_uid AND post.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.uid, t.dept_name,c.uid company_uid,c.dept_name company_name ,a.uid area_uid,a.dept_name area_name FROM sys_dept t LEFT JOIN sys_dept c ON c.uid = t.company_dept_uid LEFT JOIN sys_dept a ON a.uid = c.parent_dept_uid WHERE t.dept_class NOT IN (0,1,2) ) temp_dept ON main.dept_uid = temp_dept.uid LEFT JOIN cmn_region province ON province.uid = main.contact_province_uid AND province.region_grade = 1 LEFT JOIN cmn_region city ON city.uid = main.contact_city_uid AND city.region_grade = 2 LEFT JOIN cmn_region county ON county.uid = main.contact_county_uid AND county.region_grade = 3 LEFT JOIN demo_base_info base ON base.uid = main.base_uid AND base.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
